title.narrative: PLANNING MONITORING AND EVALUATION

description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners have the guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan, manage and monitor programmes., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Evaluation And Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programmes are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children in development and humanitarian settings.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners have the guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan, manage and monitor programmes.

description.narrative: UNICEF Pacific has strengthened its internal systems for planning, and monitoring and evaluating (M&E) through improvement of the existing work planning approaches to suit the diverse programming contexts in the Pacific. The adoption of new eTools modules, and the use of the EISI platform was done simultaneously, with while building on internal and external capacities for roll out and adoption. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: % of evaluation reports with formal management response over total evaluations completed in past year
